About Me

I am a Full Stack Designer & Consultant with over two (2) year of experience. Currently working remotely for clients around the world. I focus on working with growing startups to increase their sales by either working with their brand/product directly or via consulting an existing team. Having a detailed understanding of best UI/UX principles and SEO best practice, my sites are optimised to load fast, be responsive and be a pleasure to use.

Web Developer

Taking beautiful designs and building them into responsive and functional websites. Using CMS for easier web maintenance.

UI/UX Designer

I create beautiful User Interfaces for products that not only look good but are functional too. I then take each project with a user focused and testing mindset to promote accessibility and a better User Experience.

Consulting

Consulting for companies with an existing team. Helping to improve on their existing products.
